mapper.select: SELECT id, email, password, nickName, cottonCandy, role, createdAt, updatedAt, deletedAt FROM member ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT #{page} OFFSET #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (email, password, nickName, cottonCandy, role, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{nickName}, #{cottonCandy}, #{role}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, email, password, nickName, cottonCandy, role, createdAt, updatedAt, deletedAt FROM member WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET email = #{param.email}, password = #{param.password}, nickName = #{param.nickName}, cottonCandy = #{param.cottonCandy}, role = #{param.role}, updatedAt = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
